20110116190058.000|20110116190100.000|TR0|There's an ironic twist in the aftermath 
20110116190100.000|20110116190103.000|TR0|of the Tucson shootings.  A 63-year-old 
20110116190103.000|20110116190106.000|TR0|man wounded in the attack is in a mental 
20110116190106.000|20110116190108.000|TR0|health facility after threatening an 
20110116190108.000|20110116190111.000|TR0|Arizona Tea Party member.
20110116190111.000|20110116190113.000|TR0|
20110116190113.000|20110116190116.000|TR0|James Fuller, a former campaign volunteer 
20110116190116.000|20110116190118.000|TR0|for Gabrielle Giffords, has publicly 
20110116190118.000|20110116190121.000|TR0|blamed gun right activists for the 
20110116190121.000|20110116190124.000|TR0|shootings.  He was taken into custody at a 
20110116190124.000|20110116190126.000|TR0|town hall meeting yesterday after an 
20110116190126.000|20110116190129.000|TR0|outburst during a discussion of gun 
20110116190129.000|20110116190131.000|TR0|control.  He told Tea Party member Trent 
20110116190131.000|20110116190134.000|TR0|Humphries, "You are dead."  Fuller was 
20110116190134.000|20110116190136.000|TR0|arrested for disorderly conduct and making 
20110116190136.000|20110116190139.000|TR0|a threat, and sent to a mental health 
20110116190139.000|20110116190142.000|TR0|facility for evaluation.
20110116190142.000|20110116190144.000|TR0|
20110116190144.000|20110116190147.000|TR0|And there will be a funeral today for 
20110116190147.000|20110116190149.000|TR0|another victim of the Tucson shootings.  
20110116190149.000|20110116190152.000|TR0|Dorwan Stoddard was a retired construction 
20110116190152.000|20110116190154.000|TR0|worker.  He died shielding his wife from 
20110116190154.000|20110116190157.000|TR0|the gunman's bullets.  Stoddard's widow, 
20110116190157.000|20110116190159.000|TR0|Mavy, suffered three gunshot wounds in the 
20110116190159.000|20110116190202.000|TR0|attack.
20110116190202.000|20110116190205.000|TR0|
20110116190205.000|20110116190207.000|TR0|CNN's Ted Rowlands spoke with her.

20110116190217.000|20110116190220.000|TR0|(voice-over):  Seventy-six-year-old Mavy 
20110116190220.000|20110116190223.000|TR0|Stoddard says she and her husband Dory 
20110116190223.000|20110116190225.000|TR0|were living a fairytale.
20110116190225.000|20110116190228.000|TR0|
20110116190228.000|20110116190230.000|TR0|MAVY STODDARD, TUCSON SHOOTING VICTIM:  We 
20110116190230.000|20110116190233.000|TR0|had as good a marriage as I believe anyone 
20110116190233.000|20110116190235.000|TR0|in this world could have. ROWLANDS:  They 
20110116190235.000|20110116190238.000|TR0|were classmates who shared a first kiss in 
20110116190238.000|20110116190241.000|TR0|a school but didn't marry until they were 
20110116190241.000|20110116190243.000|TR0|in their 60s.  Both were widowed, both had 
20110116190243.000|20110116190246.000|TR0|raised four children.  For the past 15 
20110116190246.000|20110116190248.000|TR0|years, Mavy says she and Dory had a ball.
20110116190248.000|20110116190251.000|TR0|

20110116190253.000|20110116190256.000|TR0|their congresswoman, Gabrielle Giffords.
20110116190256.000|20110116190259.000|TR0|
20110116190259.000|20110116190301.000|TR0|STODDARD:  Tell her how we admired her for 
20110116190301.000|20110116190304.000|TR0|going in person out among the people.
20110116190304.000|20110116190306.000|TR0|
20110116190306.000|20110116190309.000|TR0|ROWLANDS:  When the shooting started, Mavy 
20110116190309.000|20110116190311.000|TR0|says Dory put himself between her and the 
20110116190311.000|20110116190314.000|TR0|bullets.
20110116190314.000|20110116190317.000|TR0|

20110116190319.000|20110116190322.000|TR0|don't know whether he threw me down or 
20110116190322.000|20110116190324.000|TR0|whether I -- my first thought was, get

20110116190329.000|20110116190332.000|TR0|him.

20110116190337.000|20110116190340.000|TR0|scene.

20110116190347.000|20110116190350.000|TR0|me talking to him and telling him I loved 
20110116190350.000|20110116190352.000|TR0|him and kissing him.  So he saved my life 
20110116190352.000|20110116190355.000|TR0|and gave his for it, and you can't ask for 
20110116190355.000|20110116190358.000|TR0|much more.  And he would have protected me

20110116190835.000|20110116190837.000|TR0|event; report any individual threats; and

20110116191038.000|20110116191041.000|TR0|ENDO:  Well, Fred, as you know, after a 
20110116191041.000|20110116191043.000|TR0|week of grieving for the victims of the 
20110116191043.000|20110116191046.000|TR0|Arizona shooting, now lawmakers will be 
20110116191046.000|20110116191048.000|TR0|back on Capitol Hill resuming business as 
20110116191048.000|20110116191051.000|TR0|usual.  And on tap, on the agenda, is the 
20110116191051.000|20110116191054.000|TR0|debate over health care.
20110116191054.000|20110116191056.000|TR0|
20110116191056.000|20110116191059.000|TR0|As you know House, Republicans want to 
20110116191059.000|20110116191101.000|TR0|repeal the reform law. Democrats want to 
20110116191101.000|20110116191104.000|TR0|make sure it stands.  So that is a big 
20110116191104.000|20110116191106.000|TR0|debate.
20110116191106.000|20110116191109.000|TR0|
20110116191109.000|20110116191112.000|TR0|It was heated the first time around.  This 
20110116191112.000|20110116191114.000|TR0|time we'll see what the tone is like, 
20110116191114.000|20110116191117.000|TR0|because, as you know, President Obama 
20110116191117.000|20110116191119.000|TR0|called for everyone to tone down the 
20110116191119.000|20110116191122.000|TR0|rhetoric.  So it will be interesting to 
20110116191122.000|20110116191124.000|TR0|see what lawmakers say.  Many today are 
20110116191124.000|20110116191127.000|TR0|saying, hey, look, let's have a more civil 
20110116191127.000|20110116191130.000|TR0|tone, a civil debate, and work together to 
20110116191130.000|20110116191132.000|TR0|get things done -- Fred.
